TopicTitle: Use Funds and science for improve parts

Articles.Content: I'd like a mod in which I can spent Funds and Science to improve already existing parts, and use it in VAB/SPH

Not sure what you mean by "improve existing parts." You want to be able to spend more funds and science to continue researching parts that you've already unlocked so that you can increase their stats in some way (e.g. higher ISP for an engine; lower dead-weight factor for a fuel cell)? Doesn't sound like something even remotely simple to mod. There is just such a large collection of stats which are unique to each type of component, this sounds like it would be a nightmare just to write up the basic plan before coding even begins.

Sorry for the necromancy but the answer is still relevant and this thread was hit #1 from Google when trying to find it:
